scripts.android: ng build --prod --base-href . --output-path ./CordovaMobileApp/www/ & cd ./CordovaMobileApp & cordova run android & cd ../
scripts.android-bundle: ng build --prod --base-href . --output-path ./CordovaMobileApp/www/ && cd ./CordovaMobileApp &&  cordova build android --release &&  cd ./platforms/android/ && gradlew.bat bundleRelease
scripts.nexmo-release-apk:
ng build --prod --base-href . --output-path ./CordovaMobileApp/www/ && rimraf builds/nexmo/nexmo_%npm_package_config_version% && rimraf ./CordovaMobileApp/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release && cd ./CordovaMobileApp && cordova-config set name "Check" && cordova-splash --splash --splash="nexmo-splash.png" && cordova-icon --icon=nexmo-icon.png && cordova build android --release && cd ./platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release && mkdirp ../../../../../../../../builds/nexmo/nexmo_%npm_package_config_version% && ncp ./ ../../../../../../../../builds/nexmo/nexmo_%npm_package_config_version% && git log %npm_package_config_commit%..HEAD --pretty=format:"
%H %s
" > ../../../../../../../../builds/nexmo/nexmo_%npm_package_config_version%/nexmo-release_%npm_package_config_version%-log.html && node -e "require('fs').rename('../../../../../../../../builds/nexmo/nexmo_%npm_package_config_version%/app-release.apk', '../../../../../../../../builds/nexmo/nexmo_%npm_package_config_version%/nexmo_%npm_package_config_version%.apk', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.nexmo-release-apk-linux:
ng build --prod --base-href . --output-path ./CordovaMobileApp/www/ && rimraf server/public/nexmo/nexmo_${npm_package_config_version} && rimraf ./CordovaMobileApp/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release && cd ./CordovaMobileApp && cordova-config set name "Check" && cordova-splash --splash --splash="nexmo-icon.png" && cordova-icon --icon=nexmo-icon.png && cordova build android --release && cd ./platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release && mkdirp ../../../../../../../../server/public/nexmo/nexmo_${npm_package_config_version} && ncp ./ ../../../../../../../../server/public/nexmo/nexmo_${npm_package_config_version} && git log ${npm_package_config_commit}..HEAD --pretty=format:"
%H %s
" > ../../../../../../../../server/public/nexmo/nexmo_${npm_package_config_version}/nexmo-release_${npm_package_config_version}-log.html && node -e "require('fs').rename('../../../../../../../../builds/nexmo/nexmo_${npm_package_config_version}/app-release.apk', '../../../../../../../../builds/nexmo/nexmo_${npm_package_config_version}/nexmo_${npm_package_config_version}.apk', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.nexmo-deploy-apk:
ng build --prod --base-href . --output-path ./CordovaMobileApp/www/ && rimraf builds/nexmo/nexmo_%npm_package_config_version% && rimraf ./CordovaMobileApp/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release && cd ./CordovaMobileApp && cordova-config set name "Check" && cordova-splash --splash --splash="nexmo-splash.png" && cordova-icon --icon=nexmo-icon.png && cordova build android --release && cd ./platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release && mkdirp ../../../../../../../../builds/nexmo/nexmo_%npm_package_config_version% && ncp ./ ../../../../../../../../builds/nexmo/nexmo_%npm_package_config_version% && git log %npm_package_config_commit%..HEAD --pretty=format:"
%H %s
" > ../../../../../../../../builds/nexmo/nexmo_%npm_package_config_version%/nexmo-release_%npm_package_config_version%-log.html && adb install ../../../../../../../../builds/nexmo/nexmo_%npm_package_config_version%/app-release.apk
scripts.lts-release-apk:
ng build --prod --base-href . --output-path ./CordovaMobileApp/www/ && rimraf builds/lts/lts_%npm_package_config_version% && rimraf ./CordovaMobileApp/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release && cd ./CordovaMobileApp && cordova-config set name "Fahrzeugcheck" && cordova-splash --splash --splash="lts-splash.png" && cordova-icon --icon=lts-icon.png && cordova build android --release && cd ./platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release && mkdirp ../../../../../../../../builds/lts/lts_%npm_package_config_version% && ncp ./ ../../../../../../../../builds/lts/lts_%npm_package_config_version% && git log %npm_package_config_commit%..HEAD --pretty=format:"
%H %s
" > ../../../../../../../../builds/lts/lts_%npm_package_config_version%/lts-release_%npm_package_config_version%-log.html && node -e "require('fs').rename('../../../../../../../../builds/lts/lts_%npm_package_config_version%/app-release.apk', '../../../../../../../../builds/lts/lts_%npm_package_config_version%/LTS_%npm_package_config_version%.apk', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
